explains: adj. 被征服的；被击败的
v. 征服；击败（vanquish 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: All that was needed was one final push, and the enemy would be vanquished once and for all.
sentences.cn: 只需要最后一次挺进，敌军就将被彻底击败。

sentences.en: A happy ending is only possible because the hero has first vanquished the dragons.
sentences.cn: 只有主人公先把那些恶龙制服，快乐的结局才有可能。

sentences.en: She has vanquished all her competitors.
